job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Hello Software EngineerbrbrFreeosk is looking for a Software Engineer to join our Technology team This position will own the process of automating functional testing of our kiosk application and contribute to its feature and functionality evolution Our ideal candidate has experience developing durable ReactJS or Electron based applications strong functional testing skills and a testing oriented mindsetbrbrOur HQ is in Chicago but you can be located within the continental United States There will be travel required to our Chicago office from time to timebrbrKey responsibilities for this rolebrulliImprove the durability of the Kiosk application through code enhancements technical reviews and documentationliliDesign and execute a functional test suite for the kiosk applicationliliAutomate the functional critical path testing of the kiosk applicationliliContribute to debugging and addressing field issues related to the kiosk applicationliliReview kiosk application pull requests and provide feedbackliliContribute to the forward vision of the kiosk appliulYour skills background and experience includebrulli2 years professional experience with React ReactJS and NodeJSlili3 years of professional development experience lili3 years of experience using GitliliKnowledge of Unix based operating systems a plusliliKnowledge of all or any is a plus C Java Ruby PythonliliExcellent written and verbal communication skillsliliAbility to prioritize daily activities based on project goals established by managementbrbrliulstrong Our Benefits brstrongulliCompetitive paylili401k Match ProgramliliMedical Dental Vision InsuranceliliWork From Home StipendliliShort Term and Long Term DisabilityliliLife InsuranceliliPaid Time OffliliVolunteer OpportunitiesliliSummer HoursliliParental LeaveliliTuition ReimbursementliliSabbatical ProgramliliProfessional DevelopmentliliGym StipendliliFree Divvy membershipliliSocial eventsliulWho are webrbrFreeosk uses the power of free to fuel the product discovery process speeding the connection between consumers and the brands they love We have smartkiosks in more than 1300 retail locations across the United States We count over 70 of CPG companies in the Fortune 500 as customers and every one of those in the Fortune 100 We expect to aggressively expand our network of kiosks over the next few yearsbrbrWe are a nimble Chicagobased omnichannel marketing platform made up of a crossdisciplinary team of engineers creatives data analysts account managers and other specialists We help brands advance their key marketing initiatives using our patented technology and a unique database of realworld consumer intent signalsbrbrFreeosk is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer We do not discriminate based upon race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation gender identity gender expression age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability or other applicable legally protected characteristics
